Summary This is a simple post to test Hugo.
Code formatting Typical go «Hello, World!» style program.
import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello, 世界!") } Math formatting Solving $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$ for $x$ we get the following equation. $$ x = \frac{-b±\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a} $$
title: First Post
